about_the_game:
Introducing the latest DLC featuring a revolutionary power generator! This state-of-the-art generator boasts a 50% longer lifespan compared to other models, ensuring reliable and long-lasting performance.



Additionally, its shorter startup time allows you to get it up and running quickly during critical moments. With an impressive maximum power output of 720 kW, this generator is perfect for meeting the most demanding energy needs of your setup. Enhance your gaming experience and keep your operation running smoothly with this powerful and efficient generator.

Enhance your gaming experience and keep your operation running smoothly with this powerful and efficient generator.
name: Nucleares - New Generator Set

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
